creator: stephan@wanderinghorse.net
text:
jk/native/buildconf.sh contains ^M chars (it was apparently edited with a  
Windows editor), causing it to not execute properly. Running the commands in  
the script via copy/paste-to-console works okay.  
one possible fix: 
xemacs buildconf.sh 
Esc-% 
Ctrl-Q<ENTER> 
Ctrl-M<ENTER> 
<ENTER> 
! 
Ctrl-X Ctrl-S 
Ctrl-X Ctrl-C

creator: stephan@wanderinghorse.net
text:
configure.in has the same problem: the generated configure won't run on a 
solaris box because of the ^M chars.

creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
text:
AFAIK, the mod_jk that ships with Tomcat 3 doesn't include 
either "buildconf.sh" or "configure.in".

creator: stephan@wanderinghorse.net
text: It may not ship with them - this is from the CVS tree.
